document.full_text: oil prices dropped more than 2 percent on tuesday as an interest rate increase by india added to concerns about demand and gains in the dollar helped spark a technical sell-off.
document.title: oil falls as india, dollar spark sell-off
lines_and_colors: oil prices dropped more than 2 percent on tuesday as an interest rate increase by india added to concerns about demand and gains in the dollar helped spark a technical sell-off.
